TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DropShadowBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect
Public NotInheritable Class DropShadowBitmapEffect Inherits BitmapEffect

summary.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

summary.span: Applies a shadow behind a visual object at a slight offset.

span.span: Applies a shadow behind a visual object at a slight offset.

summary.span: The offset is determined by mimicking a casting shadow from an imaginary light source.

span.span: The offset is determined by mimicking a casting shadow from an imaginary light source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 點陣圖效果是軟體呈現。 bitmap effects are software rendered. 套用效果的任何物件也會在軟體中轉譯。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不應該將點陣圖效果套用至大型的視覺效果或動畫，因為這可能會降低效能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations because this can degrade performance.

span.span: for creating an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the color of the shadow.

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the shadow.

value.span: 陰影的色彩。

span.span: The color of the shadow.

value.span: 預設值是FF000000 （黑色）。

span.span: The default value is FF000000 (black).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Alpha 值結構會忽略這個屬性。The alpha value of the structure is ignored by this property. 若要設定色彩的透明度 (alpha) 數量，請使用屬性。To set the amount of transparency (alpha) of the color, use the property. 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較陰影色彩屬性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowcolor.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較陰影色彩屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare shadow color property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowcolor.png "Screenshot: Compare shadow color property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Direction { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Direction : double with get, set

summary.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the angle at which the shadow is cast.

span.span: Gets or sets the angle at which the shadow is cast.

value.span: 陰影投射的角度。

span.span: The angle at which the shadow is cast.

value.span: 值的有效範圍為 0 到 360。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 360.

value.span: 值 0 的方向即為物體正右方。

span.span: The value 0 puts the direction immediately to the right of the object.

value.span: 後續的值則以逆時針方向繞著物體移動方向。

span.span: Subsequent values move the direction around the object in a counter-clockwise direction.

value.span: 例如，值 90 表示陰影投射在物體正上方；而值 180 投射在物體正左方，依此類推。

span.span: For example, a value of 90 indicates the shadow is cast directly upward from the object; a value of 180 is cast directly to the left of the object, and so on.

value.span: 預設值是 315。

span.span: The default value is 315.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示陰影投射針對指定的值，這個屬性的方向。The following diagram shows in which direction the shadow is cast for a given value of this property. ![圖表： DropShadow 方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "圖表： DropShadow 方向")![Diagram: DropShadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "Diagram: DropShadow direction") 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較陰影方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較陰影方向")![Screenshot: Compare shadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection.png "Screenshot: Compare shadow direction") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Noise { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Noise : double with get, set

summary.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the graininess, or "noise level," of the shadow.

span.span: Gets or sets the graininess, or "noise level," of the shadow.

value.span: 陰影的雜訊程度。

span.span: The noise level of the shadow.

value.span: 值的有效範圍為 0 到 1。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 值為 0 表示沒有雜訊，1 表示最大雜訊。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates no noise and 1 indicates maximum noise.

value.span: 值 0.5 表示 50% 的雜訊，值 0.75 表示 75% 的雜訊，依此類推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent noise, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent noise, and so on.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Noise 屬性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadownoise.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Noise 屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare Noise property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadownoise.png "Screenshot: Compare Noise property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

summary.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of the shadow.

span.span: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of the shadow.

value.span: 不透明度。

span.span: The degree of opacity.

value.span: 值的有效範圍為 0 到 1。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 值為 0 表示陰影完全透明，而值為 1 表示陰影完全不透明。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that the shadow is completely transparent, and a value of 1 indicates that the shadow is completely opaque.

value.span: 值為 0.5 表示陰影 50% 不透明，而值為 0.725 表示陰影 72.5% 不透明，依此類推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates the shadow is 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates the shadow is 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.

value.span: 小於 0 的值視為 0，而大於 1 的值則視為 1。

span.span: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

value.span: 預設為 1。

span.span: The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須用來設定的不透明度因為層級的 alpha 元件，為屬性會被忽略。This property must be used to set the opacity of the because the alpha level component of the property is ignored. 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![具有圖說文字的螢幕擷取畫面： DropShadowBitmapEffect](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowopacity.png "具有圖說文字的螢幕擷取畫面： DropShadowBitmapEffect")![Screenshot with callouts: DropShadowBitmapEffect](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowopacity.png "Screenshot with callouts: DropShadowBitmapEffect") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ShadowDepth { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ShadowDepth : double with get, set

summary.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the distance between the object and the shadow that it casts.

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between the object and the shadow that it casts.

value.span: 物件的平面陰影平面和陰影平面之間的距離是以 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]。

span.span: The distance between the plane of the object casting the shadow and the shadow plane measured in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

value.span: 值的有效範圍為 0 到 300。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 300.

value.span: 預設值為 5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 ShadowDepth 屬性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowshadowdepth.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 ShadowDepth 屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare ShadowDepth property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowshadowdepth.png "Screenshot: Compare ShadowDepth property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Softness { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Softness : double with get, set

summary.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.** The non-obsolete alternative is .

summary.span: Gets or sets the softness of the shadow.

span.span: Gets or sets the softness of the shadow.

value.span: 陰影濃淡。

span.span: The shadow's softness.

value.span: 值的有效範圍為 0 到 1。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.

value.span: 0.0 的值表示不柔和 (定義為較深的陰影)，而 1.0 表示最大柔和度 (非常模糊的陰影)。

span.span: A value of 0.0 indicates no softness (a sharply defined shadow) and 1.0 indicates maximum softness (a very diffused shadow).

value.span: 值 0.5 表示 50% 的柔和度，值 0.75 表示 75% 的柔和度，依此類推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent softness, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent softness, and so on.

value.span: 預設值為 0.5。

span.span: The default is 0.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範這個屬性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Softness 屬性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowsoftness.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Softness 屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare Softness property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowsoftness.png "Screenshot: Compare Softness property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
